1.content:
The selections are broken into The Captains, The Vice-Captains and the Special Operatives in the Human world.

I should also point out that the girls can't grow higher than 120 metres (400 ft) tall.

EDIT: because of a certain person who shall remain nameless I shall point this out. Rukia and Yoruichi are in the Special Operatives who assitst Ichigo. DO NOT create useless branches that have been already covered by another branch. If I see anything like this I will delete the chapter. Read the rules before you jump in.

Oh well,it was still a fine last drink." said Rangiku happly.

As she stood up,she almost fell over. She giggled a little and corrected her posture. She left the room and as she walked down the hall,she began to feel a little odd. She cupped her large breasts with her hands and she could feel them growing between her fingers!! "Holy cow,my boobs are getting bigger!! Oh this is great,im becoming a even hotter woman." What happens next to her?

1321.title: An unusual late growth spurt

info.brief_description: The women of the Soul Society GROW.
info.description:
This Interactive is about the growth of the women of Soul Society. There are several rules that must be followed.

1. Correct grammar and spelling. I will be lenient for simple typo's that could happen.
2. Write atleast more than one paragraph
3. NO male giants
4. NO stupid plots going off in random directions, this includes crossovers, this is strictly the Bleach Universe.
5. Keep the giantessses to their original mindset
6. NO original characters
7. The Girls CANNOT grow for absolutely no reason. There must be a reason behind the growth.

I will allow:
Gentle Giantesses (this is prefered)
Accidental vore
Nudity
Accidental destruction

I will NOT allow:
Massive Destruction
Anything to do with Feet
SCAT

I will delete posts that do not follow the rules

One last thing.
I'm making it so that only the female Captains and seated officers can grow. (Yoruichi and Rukia can grow aswell) This means that Orihime, Tatsuki or any other girl of the living world CANNOT grow.
